In my honest opinion, I believe that csgo is a very good game. The reason for this is, first of all, unlike many others, it is not pay to win. The overwatch and vac systems crack down on cheaters very well, giving you a great experience in the game. The trust factor also encourages people not to grief or use cheats, as it ruins your games further down the line.
The game itself is very tactical, meaning it does not get boring quick, making it a good game! The csgo community is also very helpful and mostly un-toxic
